verses.verse: Behold <S%H3117><s%>, the day of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> comes <S%H935><s%>, and your plunder <S%H7998><s%> shall be divided <S%H2505><s%> in the midst of you <S%H7130><s%>.

For I will gather <S%H622><s%> all nations <S%H1471><s%> against Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%>; and the city <S%H5892><s%> shall be taken <S%H3920><s%>, and the houses <S%H1004><s%> rifled <S%H8155><s%>, and the women <S%H802><s%> ravished <S%H7901><s%>; and half <S%H2677><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> into captivity <S%H1473><s%>, and the residue <S%H3499><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> shall not be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from the city <S%H5892><s%>.

Then shall the Lord <S%H3068><s%> go forth <S%H3318><s%>, and fight <S%H3898><s%> against those nations <S%H1471><s%>, as when <S%H3117><s%> he fought <S%H3898><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of battle <S%H7128><s%>.

And his feet <S%H7272><s%> shall stand <S%H5975><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%> upon the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Olives <S%H2132><s%>, which is before <S%H6440><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> on the east <S%H6924><s%>, and the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Olives <S%H2132><s%> shall cleave <S%H1234><s%> in the midst <S%H2677><s%> there toward the east <S%H4217><s%> and toward the west <S%H3220><s%>, and there shall be a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> valley <S%H1516><s%>; and half <S%H2677><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> shall remove <S%H4185><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%>, and half <S%H2677><s%> of it toward the south <S%H5045><s%>.

And you shall flee <S%H5127><s%> to the valley <S%H1516><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%>; for the valley <S%H1516><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%> shall reach <S%H5060><s%> unto Azal <S%H682><s%>: Yes <S%H5127><s%>, you shall flee, like as you fled <S%H5127><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the earthquake <S%H7494><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Uzziah <S%H5818><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>: and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%>, and all the saints with you <S%H6918><s%>.
And it shall come to pass in that day <S%H3117><s%>, that the light <S%H216><s%> shall not be clear <S%H3368><s%>, nor dark <S%H7087><s%>:

But it shall be one <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> which shall be known <S%H3045><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, not day <S%H3117><s%>, nor night <S%H3915><s%>: but it shall come to pass <S%H6153><s%>, that at evening time <S%H6256><s%> it shall be light <S%H216><s%>.

And it shall be in that day <S%H3117><s%>, that living <S%H2416><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> shall go out <S%H3318><s%> from Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>; half <S%H2677><s%> of them toward the former <S%H6931><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>, and half <S%H2677><s%> of them toward the hinder <S%H314><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>: in summer <S%H7019><s%> and in winter shall it be <S%H2779><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall be king <S%H4428><s%> over all the earth <S%H776><s%>: in that day <S%H3117><s%> shall there be one <S%H259><s%> Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and his name <S%H8034><s%> one <S%H259><s%>.

All the land <S%H776><s%> shall be turned <S%H5437><s%> as a plain <S%H6160><s%> from Geba <S%H1387><s%> to Rimmon <S%H7417><s%> south <S%H5045><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: and it shall be lifted up <S%H7213><s%>, and inhabited <S%H3427><s%> in her place <S%H1144><s%>, from Benjamin's gate <S%H8179><s%> unto the place <S%H4725><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>, unto the corner <S%H6434><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>, and from the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Hananeel <S%H2606><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%>'s winepresses <S%H3342><s%>.
And men shall live <S%H3427><s%> in it <S%H2764><s%>, and there shall be no more utter destruction; but Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall be safely <S%H983><s%> inhabited <S%H3427><s%>.

And this shall be the plague <S%H4046><s%> with which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will strike <S%H5062><s%> all the people <S%H5971><s%> that have fought <S%H6633><s%> against Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>; Their flesh <S%H1320><s%> shall consume away <S%H4743><s%> while they stand <S%H5975><s%> upon their feet <S%H7272><s%>, and their eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall consume away <S%H4743><s%> in their holes <S%H2356><s%>, and their tongue <S%H3956><s%> shall consume away <S%H4743><s%> in their mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that day <S%H3117><s%>, that a great <S%H7227><s%> tumult <S%H4103><s%> from the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall be among them <S%H2388><s%>; and they shall lay hold every one <S%H376><s%> on the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>, and his hand <S%H3027><s%> shall rise up <S%H5927><s%> against the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>.

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> also shall fight <S%H3898><s%> at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>; and the wealth <S%H2428><s%> of all the heathen <S%H1471><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> shall be gathered together <S%H622><s%>, gold <S%H2091><s%>, and silver <S%H3701><s%>, and apparel <S%H899><s%>, in great <S%H3966><s%> abundance <S%H7230><s%>.

And so shall be the plague <S%H4046><s%> of the horse <S%H5483><s%>, of the mule <S%H6505><s%>, of the camel <S%H1581><s%>, and of the donkey <S%H2543><s%>, and of all the animals <S%H929><s%> that shall be in these <S%H1992><s%> tents <S%H4264><s%>, as this plague <S%H4046><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H3498><s%>, that every one that is left of all the nations <S%H1471><s%> which came <S%H935><s%> against Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall even go up <S%H5927><s%> from <S%H1767><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> to year <S%H8141><s%> to worship <S%H7812><s%> the King <S%H4428><s%>, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, and to keep <S%H2287><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles <S%H5521><s%>.

And it shall be <S%H5927><s%>, that whoever will not come up of all the families <S%H4940><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> unto Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to worship <S%H7812><s%> the King <S%H4428><s%>, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, even upon them shall be no rain <S%H1653><s%>.

And if the family <S%H4940><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> go not up <S%H5927><s%>, and come <S%H935><s%> not <S%H4046><s%>, that have no rain; there shall be the plague, with which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will strike <S%H5062><s%> the heathen <S%H1471><s%> that come not up <S%H5927><s%> to keep <S%H2287><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles <S%H5521><s%>.

This shall be the punishment <S%H2403><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and the punishment <S%H2403><s%> of all nations <S%H1471><s%> that come not up <S%H5927><s%> to keep <S%H2287><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles <S%H5521><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall there be upon the bells <S%H4698><s%> of the horses <S%H5483><s%>, HOLINESS <S%H6944><s%> UNTO THE LORD <S%H3068><s%>; and the pots <S%H5518><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> shall be like the bowls <S%H4219><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

Yes <S%H5518><s%>, every pot in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and in Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall be holiness <S%H6944><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>: and all they that sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> of them <S%H1310><s%>, and boil in it <S%H3117><s%>: and in that day there shall be no more the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.
